mapper.select: SELECT p.post_num, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.recruitment_start_date, p.recruitment_end_date, p.activity_time, p.recruitment_limit, p.applicant_count, p.is_public, p.post_password, c.category_name, cl.client_name FROM posts p LEFT JOIN post_categories c ON p.category_num = c.category_num LEFT JOIN clients cl ON p.client_num = cl.client_num WHERE p.is_public = TRUE

SELECT p.post_num AS postNum, p.post_title AS postTitle, p.post_content AS postContent, p.recruitment_start_date AS recruitmentStartDate, p.recruitment_end_date AS recruitmentEndDate, p.activity_time, p.recruitment_limit, p.applicant_count, p.is_public, c.category_name AS categoryName, u.client_name AS clientName FROM posts p JOIN post_categories c ON p.category_num = c.category_num JOIN clients u ON p.client_num = u.client_num WHERE p.is_public = true AND (p.delete_date IS NULL OR p.delete_date = false)

SELECT p.post_num AS postNum, p.post_title AS postTitle, p.post_content AS postContent, p.recruitment_start_date AS recruitmentStartDate, p.recruitment_end_date AS recruitmentEndDate, p.activity_time, p.recruitment_limit, p.applicant_count, p.is_public, p.post_password AS password, c.category_name AS categoryName, u.client_name AS clientName FROM posts p JOIN post_categories c ON p.category_num = c.category_num JOIN clients u ON p.client_num = u.client_num WHERE p.post_num = #{postNum} AND (p.delete_date IS NULL OR p.delete_date = '')
